title: Titan of terror: The dark imagination of H.P. Lovecraft - Silvia Moreno-Garc√≠a

multiple-choice.question: Where was Howard Phillips Lovecraft born?
What type of horror stories did Lovecraft seek to invent, responding to the rapid scientific progress of his era?
In "The Colour out of Space," what strange object falls near a farmhouse, mutating it into a nightmarish hellscape?
What is the name of the shared universe created by Lovecraft and adopted by other authors, based on his stories and characters?
What is the name of the Great Old One described as "who froths as primal slime in nuclear chaos beyond the nethermost outposts of space and time"?
What is the name of the author who corresponded with Lovecraft and employed elements and characters from his stories in his own?
What is the name of the form in which "At the Mountains of Madness" is written?

options.label: C
options.text: A report of an Antarctic expedition

multiple-choice.question: What type of forces in Lovecraft's fiction are powerful, yet often invisible and indescribable?

What is the name of the Great Old One described as a blind, idiot god whose destructive impulses are stalled only by the "maddening beating of vile drums and the thin monotonous whine of accursed flutes"?
What is the name of the tabletop game inspired by Lovecraft's works?

title: The hidden network that makes the internet possible - Sajan Saini

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the phenomenon that allows light to travel within glass rather than just pass through it?
What is the main advantage of using fiber optic signals over electrical signals?

options.label: B
options.text: Fiber optic signals are more energy-efficient

options.label: C
options.text: Fiber optic signals are more reliable

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of using integrated photonics in fiber optic networks?

options.label: A
options.text: To increase the speed of data transmission

options.label: B
options.text: To reduce the cost of data transmission

options.label: C
options.text: To make fiber optic networks more energy-efficient

options.label: D
options.text: To increase the capacity of fiber optic networks

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the technology that allows for the conversion of electrical signals to optical signals and back?
What is the main limitation of using terahertz frequencies for wireless communication?

options.label: C
options.text: They get absorbed by moisture in the air or blocked by tall buildings

multiple-choice.question: What is the purpose of using optical fiber in wireless-to-fiber photonic transmitter chips?

options.label: A
options.text: To increase the speed of data transmission

options.label: B
options.text: To reduce the cost of data transmission

options.label: C
options.text: To relay terahertz signals over long-range distances

options.label: D
options.text: To increase the capacity of wireless networks

multiple-choice.question: What is the main advantage of using cloud computing?

options.label: C
options.text: It allows for greater scalability and flexibility

multiple-choice.question: What is the main limitation of cloud computing?

options.label: C
options.text: It generates too much heat waste
